entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 33 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 9 except 6 over northern sections.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9 except 6 over northern sections. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
